full_text.full_text:
Feature Extraction
▪ The creation of a new set of features from the original raw data
▪ Example
– We want to classify historical artifacts with respect to their materials
• (ex) wood, clay, bronze, gold
– In this case, a density feature constructed from the mass and volume 
features would most directly yield an accurate classification 
Artifact
Mass
Volume
Artifact
Mass
Volume Density (Mass/Volume)
▪ Unfortunately, the most common approach is to use domain 
expertise
